item.description:
Woody Allen's new film, Midnight In Paris is playing at the Strand Theater in Clinton for 3 days. Let's meet and see it on Thursday, September 1.

Gil (Owen Wilson), an aspiring writer, goes to Paris with his fiancee Inez (Rachel McAdams) and her parents. While Inez goes out dancing, Gil wanders the streets of Paris late at night and discovers a city to inspire his writing.

The movie is showing at 7:00 PM (not Midnight) at the Strand Theater in Clinton (not Paris). The cost is $5.50 per person. Let's meet outside the box office at about 6:30. Call my cell phone at 508-981-0455 if you need to reach me.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be waiting outside the box office. I look like my photo, but with a goatee.

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: Midnight In Paris
